guide.introduction:
THINGS REQUIRED: coke tin, heating element which , plug, wire, music wire,tin sheet and insulating tape.

PROCEDURE:

1.cut the top part of the coke tin.

2.attach the heating element using music wire.

3.attach the wire to the heating element.

4.now cover the heating element with a tin sheet.

5.now plug in the wire and on the switch.

6.take a tester and check the tin is there any leackage of current.

7.now its ready to make coffee.
